28,347 89,436 Total 1944 655,289 356,812 1,012,101 1945 Jan 47,477 16,914 64,491 Feb 68,365 31,348 99,713 Mar 111,472 35,408 146,880 Apr 79,402 41,495 120,897 May 5,565 646 6,211 Jun Jul Aug Total 1945 312,381 125,811 438,192 Grand Total 1,034,052 659,513 1,693,565   ## p. 636 (#660) ############################################    ## p. 637 (#661) ############################################  Appendix 13 Combat Sorties Flown in the European Theater of Operations August 1942 to May 1945 Heavy Bomber Med/Lt Bomber Fighter Total Airborne Effective Airborne Effective Airborne Effective Airborne Effective 1942 Aug 114 76 210 200 324 276 Sep 183 99 240 230 423 329 Oct 284 143 250 240 534 383 Nov 519 271 110 100 629 371 Dec 353 165 190 180 543 345 Total 1942 1,453 754 1,000 950 2,453 1,704 1943 Jan 338 220 429 422 767 642 Feb 526 313 450 435 976 748 Mar 956 823 Apr 449 349 I I 608 584 1,564 1,407 540 510 989 859 May 1,672 1,471 223 23 2,220 2,109 3,915 3,603 Jun 2,107 1,268 1,997 1,879 4,104 3,147 Jul 2,829 1,743 416 416 2,286 2,133 5,531 4,292 Aug 2,265 1,850 1,297 904 2,264 2,017 5,826 4,771 Sep 3,259 2,457 2,611 1,808 3,424 2,987 9,294 7,252 Oct 2,831 2,117 1,236 521 3,396 2,888 7,463 5,526 Nov 4,157 2,581 1,562 867 3,905 3,436 9,624 6,884 Dec 5,973 4,937 2,162 994 5,741 5,101 13,876 11,032 Total 1943 27,362 20,129 9,307 5,533 27,260 24,501 63,929 50,163 1944 Jan 6,367 5,027 1,649 1,050 7,167 6,464 15,183 12,541 Feb 9,884 7,512 3,862 2,373 10,679 9,703 24,425 19,588 Mar 11,590 8,773 4,099 3,025 16,261 14,613 31,950 26,411 Apr 14,464 9,945 7,416 5,332 21,554 19,216 43,434 34,493 May 19,825 13,975 11,944 8,523 36,210 32,860 67,979 55,358 Jun 28,925 22,713 11,711 8,908 55,460 50,748 96,096 82,369 Jul 23,917 18,864 8,008 5,839 42,953 39,923 74,878 64,626 Aug 22,967 18,964 9,182 6,588 45,827 42,409 77,976 67,961 Sep 18,268 15,617 5,431 3,379 33,685 30,397 57,384 49,393 Oct 19,082 17,058 3,633 1,800 29,881 27,132 52,596 45,990 Nov 17,003 15,245 5,176 3,224 30,120 27,871 52,2
